name: Conqueror's Haki
description: Allows the user to overpower the will of others. Advanced users can channel this Haki into their attacks, greatly enhancing their power.

name: Armament Haki
description: Allows the user to create invisible armor for defense and increased attack power, bypassing Devil Fruit defenses.

name: Advanced Armament Haki
description: Allows the user to emit Armament Haki a short distance from their body, causing internal damage to targets.

name: Observation Haki
description: Allows the user to sense the presence, strength, emotions, and movements of others.

name: Advanced Observation Haki
description: Allows the user to see a short distance into the future, providing a significant advantage in combat.
